about_the_game:
Lifelong is a first-person exploration and puzzle-solving game.

Lifelong is a surreal world full of strange beings! It's a fantastic universe that traps you in mindless offices. It's a world of the absurd, of metaphor and stupefaction, in the service of an incisive tone that criticizes the contemporary workplace.

NAVIGATE THROUGH A BUREAUCRATIC HELL

You play the role of an employee enslaved by the most vile corporation of all: Scopesoft. While you were just an underling, a remote control with incredible powers is mistakenly left on your desk. Your manager tells you to bring it back immediately - but this is your chance to escape!

THE POWERS OF REMOTE CONTROL VIDEOXPORT V0.8

This incredible object is the company's latest jewel, normally reserved for the top brass and not for a stooge like you. Use it to solve puzzles and progress. Experiment with your environment and manipulate your colleagues to get them to help you. It's all about escaping your superiors!




  • Activate and deactivate objects remotely. Manipulate and move your colleagues to help you progress!
  • Spying, Aim a camera to use it. Point at a colleague to spy on his thoughts. Every clue is a step towards the exit!
  • Switch bodies with one of your colleagues and swap positions. Jump from body to body to explore inaccessible places!

SECRETS TO BE DISCOVERED

Navigate freely around the company and use your powers to explore previously inaccessible rooms. Search the nooks and crannies, observe and experiment: Scopesoft is full of mysteries and hidden places.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel i5 4000
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Lifelong is a first-person adventure game about the bureaucratic empire and the meaninglessness of certain jobs. You play as Marcel Dämlich, an employee of Scopesoft, a complex and labyrinthine company.
